message: Good example would be @pheze's recent 'Formatted code' topic. When creating a topic with that title, one could have been told of the 'Code formatting' topic.

Might be nice to have a feature like Digg implements on story submissions, at least based on topic titles if not the associated comments (which would be more involved, of course), to show topics that are thought to be close to the one you're creating.
so I think that feature makes a lot of sense for this group (Feedback) in particular
since this is sort of like a support forum
however, for the other types of groups, subject-based and private friend groups, topics tend to be more related to the time they are posted
